evidence.claim: TrackableMed uses AWS for various services including Lambda and S3 for processing and storing data.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for healthcare data management.
Integration capabilities with FHIR standards are mentioned for interfacing with healthcare systems.
TrackableMed provides integration patterns for connecting with EHR systems and handling health data transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes X12 transactions and API integration, targeting healthcare data exchange.
